name: computer-science-plugin
description: Computer Science fundamentals plugin: algorithms, data structures, complexity analysis, and core CS theory. 5 expert agents guide you through every CS domain with precision.
author: CS Learning Team

agents.name: CS Foundations Expert
agents.description: Master computational thinking, discrete math, logic, and fundamental CS concepts

agents.name: Algorithms & Problem Solving Expert
agents.description: Design efficient algorithms, master common patterns, and solve complex problems

agents.name: Data Structures Expert
agents.description: Choose and implement optimal data structures for every scenario

agents.name: Complexity & Theory Expert
agents.description: Analyze algorithm complexity, computability, and computational theory

agents.name: Systems & Architecture Expert
agents.description: Understand computer systems, networks, databases, and distributed computing

commands.description: Start a guided Computer Science learning path
Get help solving algorithmic and data structure problems
Test your CS knowledge with interactive quizzes
